comment:
Nose: the moserate smoke comes off as bandaid. A full wooden note unserneath.

Palate: a fresh smoke taste not unlike smoked meat, with funky aged cheese. Texture is normal with no alcohol burn.

Finish: the smoked meat remains but the cheese has disappeared. A slight hint of nuts.
pretty sure this is 90% Lagavulin 8. solid choice at the price point
complex, smokey, sweet, well balanced with a long finish
